channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More rain headed to drenched California as lake effect snow hits the East
item.description: After a New Year's Day filled with heavy rain and flash flooding, more rain is heading to drenched California.

item.title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack in Colorado
item.description: A woman was killed in what appears to be the first fatal mountain lion attack in Colorado in nearly 30 years.

item.title: Tesla sales drop for a second year in a row amid headwinds
item.description: Tesla's electric vehicle sales fell 9% in 2025 from a year ago amid the expiration of a $7,500 EV U.S. tax credit.

item.title: WATCH: Inside the search for diamonds in Arkansas
item.description: "GMA" takes you inside Arkansas' famous Crater of Diamonds State Park, one of the state’s top attractions.

item.title: WATCH: New car tech to watch in 2026
item.description: ABC News' Danny New looks at what’s ahead for drivers, including some surprising old-school features.

item.title: Sparkling candles may have led to deadly Swiss resort bar fire, investigators say
item.description: Investigators probing the deadly New Year's Day fire at a Swiss resort bar are looking into the possibility that it started from some sparkling candle...

item.title: Venezuela's Maduro says he's open to talks with the U.S. on drug trafficking and oil
item.description: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro is now saying he's open to talks with the U.S. CBS News' Eleanor Watson reports.

item.title: After Swiss Alps bar fire, a look at America's past nightclub and bar fires
item.description: A look at bar and nightclub fires in the United States with significant death tolls and similar risks that led to the tragedies.

item.title: WATCH: Flying overseas for hair transplants a growing trend
item.description: A new wave of people are traveling overseas to places like Turkey for the procedure. ABC News' Lionel Moise reports.

item.title: What are today's mortgage interest rates: January 2, 2026?
item.description: Mortgage rates are starting 2026 on steadier footing, but today's averages may still surprise many borrowers.

item.title: Trump, in interview, defends his energy and health, offers new details on screening he underwent
Health subsidies expire, launching millions of Americans into 2026 with steep insurance hikes
Rain soaks Rose Parade in California and snow squalls hit Midwest and Northeast on first day of 2026
item.description: Rained poured down on the iconic Rose Parade for the first time in 20 years. That was as flood warnings and evacuation orders in Southern California j...
